bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Walker et al. Sheriff's Fees
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: We went around together considerately came from some town as he did (gardener ogn): have not had many conversation with L. meganding the Walker family. but he told you once that walkers brother was going to poison him : told me that about 2 months ago: he has shoken to me of Mr. Walker & told me that she was a good friend of his: said the Walker boys more jealous of him and that the brother (chas. W) made the threats: have seen Lockwood & Mrs. W. meet in the aly, and " strike off " together: shows of this having met several times:
St. B. Lockwood recalled: It was Wednesday July 8th '85_ that the walker boys chased Willie home
H. F. McKay recalled. Boat got in about on time Wednesday night know a hackman said he looked at watch and was 10.15 to m. when boat rounded print.

I hereby certify that the above and foregoing is a time, full and transunsst of all the proceedings held by me in the matter of the insuction held over the body of Wm Lockwood at Tacoma. Pierce Cony Wash. Terr Sated this 18th day of July 1885.
